about.description: TB units are common worker units. TBs are used to carry and move loads. They use a move, lift and toss module. Their tasks can vary in complexity.
about.Did_you_know: Did you know, TB is said to stand for 'ThrowBro'. Their creator, De Havilland and his friends developed this unit during their college days. It is our oldest unit still in use.
